subject: ✅ FIXED - SUCCESS Email System Test
html:
✅ Email Fixed!

SUCCESS Magazine

The Fix is Complete!

This email confirms the SUCCESS Magazine email system is now properly configured.

✅ What was fixed:

Changed RESEND_FROM_EMAIL from unverified noreply@success.com to verified onboarding@resend.dev sandbox domain.

Email System Ready For:

  • CRM campaigns
  • Newsletter sends
  • Password resets
  • Transactional emails
  • Staff welcome emails
  • Automated sequences

Note: Emails may land in spam until success.com domain is verified by Resend account owner.
